entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 06 January 2023
